Package dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.trigger

Triggers: This package contains classes to create, manage and query triggers.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AbstractConfigurableTrigger Trigger that are registered via extension-point implement the AbstractConfigurableTrigger class.
AbstractTrigger The base implementation of a trigger.
AutoConfigureTrigger This class implements triggers that trigger an auto configure functionality.
SidebarTrigger Sidebar triggers are used to register wizards for the sidebar view.
TriggerRegistry This class manages all registered triggers.
 

Package dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.trigger Description

Triggers:

This package contains classes to create, manage and query triggers.

The core classes for trigger handling are:

  • AbstractTrigger: An abstract implementation of a trigger.
  • AbstractConfigurableTrigger: An abstract implementation of a configurable trigger. The representation of a configurable trigger can be restricted via extension point.
  • AutoConfigureTrigger: Implementation for an autoconfigure trigger.
  • SidebarTrigger: Implementation for a sidebar trigger.
  • TriggerRegistry: Manages all registered triggers.
